ygData.subject: First Time Research Results
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I made level 16 last night so I decided to try research for the first time.  I had been collecting runes for a while, so I had a sizable collection in
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I made level 16 last night so I decided to try research for the
first time. I had been collecting runes for a while, so I had a sizable
collection in the bank. Just thought I would share the results.

Project Lightning - I had enough runes to attempt this spell twice. The
first attempt failed, the second one succeeded! My first spell! Ok, 1
out of 2 is not bad.

Pillar of Fire - Well, I only had one rune of nagafen, so I could only
attempt this one once. It failed. Now at 1 of 3 attempts.

Identify - Now I had heard this spell was useless, but I figured I still
wanted to play with research. I had enough runes to attempt this spell
4 times. I had 3 failures and a success on the fourth try.


Total success rate: 2 out of 7 tries.


I'm not sure if the research skill ever goes up, mine did not. Does the
skill raise?

See you all onlinge,

Soren
16th Level
Wizard
